description:
Overwhelmed by messages asking you what you want for Christmas, for your wedding, housewarming, birthdays, or about gifts for your kids? You forget who asked, where the messages are and worry that you've gotten it all mixed up.

With Óskar, gift giving is made simpler.

Create wish lists for yourself or your family and share them with those that need to know, making gift giving simpler and less stressful for everyone involved.

Shop on Temu for exclusive offers. 

No matter what you're looking for, Temu has you covered, including fashion, home decor, handmade crafts, beauty & cosmetics, clothing, shoes, and more.

Download Temu today and enjoy incredible deals daily.

WIDE SELECTION
Discover thousands of new products and shops.

CONVENIENCE
Fast and secure checkout.
Free shipping & returns within 90 days.
*Other conditions may apply

Visit temu.com or follow us on:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/temu/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@temu 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/shoptemu
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@temu

Boozt – The Nordic Department Store

Discover the latest trends and collections for women, men, and kids, and shop
from our five popular categories: Fashion, Kids, Sport, Beauty, and Home.

Download the app and enjoy these special benefits and features:
- Get notified on sales offers and special discounts.
- Enjoy ultra-fast delivery
- 30-day free return policy.
- Keep track of your orders.
- Quick, easy, and secure payment options.
- Shop a wide variety of products from our five departments: Fashion, Kids,Sport, Beauty, Home.
- Browse among 700+ Scandinavian and international brands.
- Explore our Designer shop full of carefully selected premium brands.
- Stay updated on the latest trends and collections.
- Enable push notifications to receive instant alerts about sales, special discounts, and new collections.
- Save your favourite styles in a wishlist for future purchases.
- Follow your favourite brands and get notified about new collections andre stocks.
- Shop sustainable fashion from our Made with Care category.
- Explore ReBoozt, where you can shop and sell pre-loved Boozt items.
- Join Club Boozt and earn points, that will unlock extra discounts and special benefits, each time you shop.
- Reach out to our friendly customer service team whenever you need help.

Shop on the go with the Nordic Department Store in your pocket!

Comprehensive

Quickly search, get product details, read reviews and purchase millions of products available from Amazon and other merchants.

Convenient
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options. No need to create a new account to manage your 1-Click settings and wish lists, track your orders and use your Prime membership benefits. Shop just as you do on the web.

Fast
Compare prices and check availability instantly by scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing your search. 

Secure
All purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers.

Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp, Amazon.sg from a single app.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom or Brazil: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.
 
For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g. www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (e.g. www.amazon.com/privacy) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

Costco miðstöðin - Allt á einum stað. Skoðaðu allt sem Costco hefur upp á að bjóða í
einföldu appi með ótal möguleika:
 
STAFRÆN AÐILD
Skráðu stafræna aðild svo þú getir alltaf nálgast Costco aðildarkortið þitt, hvar sem þú ert í
Heiminum.
 
SPARNAÐUR AÐEINS FYRIR MEÐLIMI
Skoðaðu nýjustu tilboðin í vöruhúsinu og sparaðu í öllum vöruflokkum á nýjum vörum og
vinsælum vörum.
 
FÁÐU FRÉTTIRNAR FYRST
Kveiktu á tilkynningum og skoðaðu pósthólfið þitt til að missa aldrei af sértilboðum í appinu,
nýjustu tilboðum Costco og uppfærslum og fréttum frá vöruhúsinu.
 
UMSJÓN MEÐ AÐILDINNI
Endurnýjaðu aðildina eða skráðu sjálfvirka endurnýjun til að sjá um það fyrir þig. Ef þú ert
ekki þegar meðlimur Costco geturðu skráð þig auðveldlega í appinu og byrjað að spara í
dag!

Your Costco hub - Everything you want, all in one place. Quickly access everything Costco has to offer in one easy-to-use app featuring:
 
DIGITAL MEMBERSHIP
Sign up for digital membership to always have access to your Costco Wholesale membership
card, wherever you are in the world.
 
MEMBER-ONLY SAVINGS
Browse the latest warehouse offers to save across all departments on new items and member favourites.
 
BE THE FIRST TO KNOW
Turn on notifications and view your inbox to never miss exclusive in-app offers, the latest deals from Costco and updates and news from your favourite warehouse.
 
MANAGE YOUR MEMBERSHIP
Renew your membership or sign up for auto-renewal for more peace of mind. If you’re new to Costco, effortlessly join using the app and start saving today!

Ekkert vesen
Regn býður upp á öruggt umhverfi til að kaupa og selja. Allir notendur eru auðkenndir með rafrænum skilríkjum og ferlið er einfalt og hnitmiðað. Seljandi setur upp sitt verð og kaupandi smellir á hnapp til að kaupa.

Kaupa
Það hefur aldrei verið jafn auðvelt að kaupa notuð föt. Þú getur síað eftir þinni stærð, skoðað eftir vörumerki, og kosið að fylgja ákveðnum seljendum. Kaup fara svo fram í gegnum Apple Pay eða Aur.

Selja
Það er auðvelt að selja staka flík — eða heilan fataskáp ef þú vilt það. Skráning á sölu tekur ekki meira en mínútu og söluþóknun bara tekin við sölu. Þá er ekki boðið upp á samskipti fyrir sölu þannig að þú ert í fríi frá harki og prútti.

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

Shop brands you love:

- Shop big brands and local stores, and follow your faves
- Get notified about special offers, price drops, restocks, and new product drops
- Save items for later and organize things into collections (like “camping gear” or “ideas for dad”)
- Just so you know: brands don’t pay extra to sell on Shop, which means each time you buy, you’re helping out the business

Check out with one tap:

- Your payment info, shipping address, and shopping preferences all live in your secure Shop Pay wallet
- Just tap to check out (no more getting up to go find your card)
- Every shopping cart from every store is saved on Shop, so it’s all there when you’re ready to check out
- Just so you know: your info is safe with Shop, which meets strict PCI compliance standards

Track all your orders:

- See every order from every store you buy from
- Map exactly where each package is now
- Shop can even scan your email for new order info and collect it for you in the app (no more searching your inbox for updates) 

- - -

Have a question or just want to say hello? Contact us by visiting help.shop.app

Shop secure and worry free: Our servers meet strict PCI compliance standards for vaulting credit card info.

Powered by Shopify: Shop was created by the commerce platform trusted by millions of businesses worldwide.

Everything you love, now at your fingertips!

The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

Discover the Zara collection with proposals for Women, Men and Kids. Through our application and our online store, you can shop and see all our new collections and fashion editorials for the upcoming seasons. 


Woman: 
Among Zara's proposals for women are the following categories of clothing and accessories: 
-	Shirts 
-	T-shirts/Bodysuits
-	Tops
-	Sweatshirts & Hoodies
-	Skirts
-	Trousers
-	Jeans
-	Shorts
-	Coats
-	Shoes
-	Bags
-	Swimwear
-	Accessories
-	Lingerie
-	Beauty
-	Perfume 
-	Basics
-	Total Look
-	Suits


Man:
The Zara Collection for men includes: 
-	Basics
-	Trousers
-	Cargo/parachute 
-	Jeans
-	Jackets/overshirts
-	Sweatshirts & Hoodies
-	T-shirts

-	Sweaters/jackets
-	Suits
-	Trench coats
-	Blazers
-	Shoes
-	Bags/backpacks
-	Accessories
-	Perfume 


Kids:
A selection for garments, accessories and shoes for: 
-	Girl: 6–⁠14 years
-	Boy: 6–⁠14 years
-	Baby girl: 9 months - 6 years
-	Baby boy: 9 months - 6 years
-	Newborn: 0-12 months
	
In addition, Zara's children's collection includes its Edited/customisable section, a selection of customisable clothing and accessories that is updated weekly. 


In addition to our permanent collections, with our Zara App you can find all our special launches, our beauty category and our lingerie line. 

Other utilities of the Zara App are:  
-	Favourites: Use your favourites list to save all the clothes and accessories you like.
-	Easy, intuitive and fast tracking of orders and returns. Track your order in each part of the process. 
-	Find your nearest Zara store. 
-	Activate notifications and receive information about new arrivals, launchings, special collections... 


Store mode 
-	Use your application in ""store mode"" when you are shopping in any of our stores and use all its features to improve your experience. 


Zara QR:
Use your QR on the Zara App for: 
-	Having associated all of your purchases online and at physical stores. At a physical store, identify yourself at the till with your Zara QR code and request an e-receipt.
-	In-store returns for both online and in-store purchases.
-	Collect all of your online orders at a physical store.

Snjallari verslun – sama verð! 
 
Psssst… í Snjallverslun Krónunnar getur þú m.a.:
 • Keypt matvöru og sótt pöntun í verslun eða fengið heimsent
 • Keypt það sama og síðast með einum smelli
 • Fylgst með stöðu pöntunar
 • Skoðað girnilegar uppskriftir og skellt hráefnum beint í körfu
 • Búið til hópa, t.d fyrir fjölskylduna eða vinnustaðinn.
 • Búið til innkaupalista og geymt, t.d. „sumarbústaðurinn“, „barnaafmælið“.
 • Deilt vörum og listum með vinum og vandamönnum.
 • Skannað vörur og fengið upplýsingar um verð og innihald vöru
 • Skoðað vöruúrvalið eftir vöruflokkum eða leitað af vörum
 • Fengið tillögur að vörum sem gott er að kaupa saman
 • Fengið yfirlit yfir kaupsöguna þína
 • Flett upp staðsetningu verslana
 • Haft samband og flett upp algengum spurningum
 • Fengið tilkynningar þegar vörurnar hafa verið teknar saman

Life’s easier in the eBay app! Buy and sell millions of items on the go. Discover exclusive online deals every single day.

Never miss a deal
With the eBay app, you can stay in the know with real-time alerts about your Daily Deals, order updates and more, all sent to your device with personalised push notifications.

Search, find and save faves
Experience game-changing shopping wherever you are:
● Shop by condition: From brand new to pre-loved fashion and Refurbished tech, find something that’s just right for you.
● Heart your faves: Stay in the loop on the latest drops and deals by adding them to your Watchlist.
● Search with pics: See something you like? Simply upload it with the push of a button and find matches instantly.

Planet-friendly shopping
Save money while discovering something truly unique when you shop for vintage and pre-loved finds. Plus, give great pieces a second life and help the planet while you’re at it. What’s not to love?

eBay Live exclusives
Your real-time shopping experience is here! Join the livestream for exclusive drops, live auctions, case breaks, and beyond. Connect with your community, fave sellers,
and creators for more of the things you love. 

Free selling
Clear out your space the easy way. Sell for free* and list your past loves with our handy AI tools. Plus, enjoy the benefits of Simple Delivery, including prepaid labels, automatic tracking and full protection for items lost or damaged in transit.
*Excludes Vehicles and business sellers.

Quickly list items with AI
Snap or upload a photo in the eBay app, then let AI instantly generate descriptions and key details for your listing, including brand, category and more. You can also add order tracking and chat with your community live.

Authenticity Guarantee
Shop with confidence. The Authenticity Guarantee tick means eligible trading cards, sneakers, watches and handbags will be inspected and verified by expert authenticators.

eBay Money Back Guarantee
Enjoy total peace of mind thanks to eBay Money Back Guarantee. With us, you’re covered. Get the item you ordered or your money back, it’s that simple.*

*For full eligibility criteria and all terms and conditions, visit:
https://pages.ebay.co.uk/ebay-money-back-guarantee/

Explore quick and easy payment options
We make it easy to pay for the things you want. Simply store your preferred payments safely and securely so you can check out in a flash!

Keep in touch
Your feedback is important to us. Contact us with any questions by joining the discussion at www.ebay.com/iOS.

Welcome to the Universe of Special.
 
Shop Etsy—your global marketplace for original items made, handpicked, and designed by real people for all budgets. Explore everything from vintage treasures and trending style pieces to personalised jewellery and custom home decor. Get offers and deals on one-of-a-kind items from 800,000+ local shops in the UK, chat with Etsy sellers, track your orders, and more.
 
Shopping for holiday gifts or decorating for winter? No matter what you’re looking for, Etsy has the pieces that speak to you. Download today and discover original gifts and seasonal treasures from our community of sellers.
 
Shop the Etsy app.
 
App Marketplace Features
 
Global Marketplace: Buy Global, Support Local
• Shop over 15+ categories of original items from all over the world—from handmade furniture to vintage clothing.
• Favourite shops, save items, and organise your pieces in collections for future inspiration.
• Buy unique finds from trusted tastemakers, including Martha Stewart, Naomi Osaka, and more.
• Explore the latest trends and get inspired with the fall and winter trend guide, curated by our marketplace insights and experts.
 
Gift Special: Gifting with Etsy
• Create a gift list of your favourite items and save special occasions for helpful reminders.
• Shopping last minute? Make every gift special with custom gift teasers that give people a sneak peek at their present. Or, send a gift card with a personalised touch!
• Personalise style essentials, jewellery, and decor to make your gifts one-of-a-kind.
 
Save More: Offers & Deals
• Stay updated on offers and deals from small shops with push notifications.
• Buy curated selections of items on sale from Etsy sellers you love.
• Shop thrift finds and keep fashion circular, with vintage steals from small shops.
 
 
Shopping with Ease: Track, Chat & Buy
• Chat with Etsy sellers, ask questions, and stay in-the-know on your order status.
• Read customer reviews for small shops that speak to you.
• Order up and track shipments easily from the app, with customisable notifications.
• Purchase safely with secure payments, including credit/debit, Etsy gift cards, Paypal, Klarna, and quick purchases with Apple Pay.  
 
Unique Finds for All: Home, Style & More
• Furniture, home goods and decor: Style your space or give the perfect housewarming gift with pieces like handmade glassware sets or a custom dining table.
• Original art and collectibles: Explore current trends and vintage finds from around the world, like Turkish pottery and Portuguese ceramics.
• Clothes, jewellery and accessories: Shop vintage designer clothing and handmade accessories to elevate your personal wardrobe.
• DIY ideas: Get all the supplies and craft kits you need to throw a themed party or learn a new hobby.
 
Enjoy shopping with a personalised touch. Join a global marketplace and shop furniture, style essentials, art decor, and more for every occasion with the Etsy app. Download today.
 
*Etsy does not evaluate vintage items’ condition and authenticity.

GOAT is the global platform for the greatest products from the past, present and future.

Shop new and pre-owned sneakers, apparel and accessories, including new-season, vintage and sold-out items. Unlock app-only drops, join exclusive events and discover curated collections.

SHOP THE GREATEST BRANDS

Explore more than two million listings from streetwear and luxury brands, including Nike, Air Jordan, adidas, New Balance, Rick Owens, Fear of God Essentials, Loewe and Palace.

NEVER MISS A DROP

Track upcoming releases, save your most-wanted styles and stay in the know with real-time updates. Place offers and get notified instantly on price drops and restocks.

GET INSPIRED

Discover stories featuring creative visionaries such as Yoon Ahn, Peso Pluma and Tyshawn Jones. Try before you buy and experience sneakers on feet in augmented reality.

AUTHENTICITY ASSURED

Shop the greatest styles with buyer protection guaranteed on all purchases. Shipping to over 170 countries.

Welcome to Cider: the fashion brand of the new generation. 

We curate an inspired closet for the global trendsetter in all of us, bringing you affordable, everyday statement pieces that make you feel like the main character every single day.

We're a social-first, globally-minded brand that always keeps YOU at the forefront of our minds. Through the universal language of social media, we host an online party where fashion inspiration and influence permeates physical borders. With the support of our amazing #cidergang community, we're able to take quality and affordability to the next level, all while shipping to 100+ countries across the globe!

Go ahead and join the party on our app! Here you'll get:
 - Early access to everything - turn on push notifications for new drops, flash sales, and exclusive deals
 - Effortless shopping experience - shop by mood, trend, edit and save your faves to your wishlist
 - Safe and easy purchase - enjoy secure checkout, multiple payment methods, and instant order tracking right to your door
 
Download the Cider app now! Cute outfits are waiting... 

Also find us on:
URL: www.shopcider.com
Customer Support: hi@shopcider.com
Social (Instagram/TikTok/YouTube/Snapchat/Facebook/Pinterest): @shopcider

Description. 

Get the latest trends and discover them from any location. If you love wearing fashion and using any occasion to buy clothes via the internet, download our MANGO app. Simple, easy and intuitive! 

Our most digital version features all the garments in the collection: women’s, men’s and children’s clothing. What’s more, through notifications you can discover the latest products, enjoy exclusive offers and stay up to date with the latest trends in online fashion. 

Choose your favourites with the app! Download it free and enjoy a unique experience in mobile format. 

Fashion on your mobile. 

Wherever you are, log on quickly to get your must-haves. Browse through the different collections featured, be inspired by the proposed outfits in each editorial and find what you are looking for by using the size, colour and price filters. Be inspired by all the proposals for the perfect shopping experience.  

Your online shopping bag can be accessed from any device. 

Whenever you log on to our online clothing app with your user ID and password, your items will be saved so that you can access them from any device. So, if you start filling your shopping bag from your Smartphone and later decide to continue shopping via your Tablet, the items will be synchronised, allowing you to finalise your order whenever and however you want. Enjoy your online fashion app whenever you want! 

Barcode scanner. 

You can also use the app when you are shopping in our physical stores. If you see an item you want to buy but there are none left in your size or preferred colour, you can get it via our app. Scan the barcode of the item, or enter it manually, to see where you can find one or to buy it online. Once you have placed the order, you can receive it at home or at your preferred location. 

Exclusive information

You can also use our app to stay up to date with our promotions and exclusive offers in online fashion. Enable the instant notifications feature and you’ll be among the first to discover the new collection garments arriving each week, the lookbooks to inspire your stylings of the season and the discounts and promotions you can enjoy. 

Find your nearest store. 

If you need to have the garment you want right now, use the geolocation feature of our app and find your nearest store and the quickest way to get there. 

Create your Wishlist. 

Now, your Wishlist, in a single click: include all the garments you like most in your Wishlist. Also, if you didn't manage to buy a garment in time, you can enable an availability notification. Simply enter your e-mail and you’ll receive a message as soon as it’s back in stock. 

Manage your account. 

Log on to your profile and edit your personal data whenever you like, for example the delivery address. You can also log on to the My orders section to keep all your till receipts, for both online orders and your purchases in physical stores.  You can also track all your orders and manage any returns. 

The MANGO app is much more than an online store. Shop in a simple and secure way. 

We invite you to send us your comments and suggestions on this update at the following e-mail address: online@mango.com

Black Friday starts here — score huge deals on the AliExpress app right now. AliExpress brings millions of items across fashion, electronics, home, beauty and more, all in one easy app so you can grab Black Friday discounts, flash sales and app-only coupons.

Find top brands, unique finds and everyday essentials at great prices. Read honest buyer reviews, compare sellers, and use smart search and filters to find exactly what you want. With AliExpress you get personalized recommendations, saved wishlists, price-drop alerts and curated collections tailored to your tastes.

We make shopping safe and simple. AliExpress protects your purchase with secure payments, buyer protection and easy returns. Track orders in real time, get delivery updates, and choose fast shipping options when you need items quickly. Chat with sellers or our support team right from the app.

Don’t miss limited-time Black Friday deals, exclusive app offers and flash events — AliExpress updates promotions constantly so you can save more. Whether you’re hunting for gifts, seasonal styles, or must-have gadgets, AliExpress puts endless choice and value in your pocket.

Download the AliExpress app today, join millions of shoppers, and enjoy worry-free shopping during Black Friday and all year round. Great finds and huge savings are just a tap away on AliExpress.

Bónus appið 
Bónus hefur þróað app til að auðvelda viðskiptavinum sínum að versla í Bónus.

Gripið & greitt vildarkort
Í appinu getur þú meðal annars nálgast Gripið & greitt vildarkort. Þú þarft það til að geta notað nýja sjálfsafgreiðslulausn sem Bónus er byrjað að bjóða viðskiptavinum sínum upp á í ákveðnum verslunum.

Deilanlegir innkaupalistar
Hægt er að búa til einn eða fleiri innkaupalista í appinu til að halda utanum það sem vantar á heimilið. Það er einnig hægt að deila innkaupalistanum með öðrum fjölskyldumeðlimum til að tryggja að ekkert gleymist.

Upplýsingar um vöruframboð
Í fyrsta sinn er vöruframboð Bónus aðgengilegt í gegnum snjalltæki. Það er einnig hægt að leita eftir vörum eða skoða vöruflokka í appinu.  

Rafrænar greiðslukvittanir
Eftir að þú ert búin að versla berast þér rafrænar greiðslukvittanir í appið svo það er auðvelt að skoða hvað var keypt og hvað það kostaði aftur í tímann.

Appið er í stöðugri þróun og spennandi ný virkni væntanleg á næstunni.

Whatnot is the largest live shopping platform in the UK, Europe, and US — we’re a marketplace bringing millions together to shop, sell, and connect around the things they love. From bags to beauty, comics to coins, sneakers to streetwear, and vintage to vinyl—we’ve got it all. Explore 250+ categories, including electronics, sports and Pokémon cards, fashion, plants, jewellery, and more. 

FIND INCREDIBLE DEALS ON NAME BRANDS - Join hundreds of thousands of sellers to shop deep discounts from your fashion favourites and everyday essentials. From brands you know and love, to emerging and hard-to-find specialty products. Whatnot has a deal on whatever you’re looking for.

SHOPPING HAS NEVER BEEN MORE FUN - Whether you’re getting in on fast-paced auctions, incredible flash sales, live show giveaways, searching through the marketplace, or jumping into the chat—you’ve never had this much fun shopping. Whatnot has brought the best of shopping in-person online. 

INTERESTED IN SELLING ON WHATNOT? Last year, small businesses generated more than £2.5 billion in sales on Whatnot. Make more by selling live, join Whatnot today.

The ASOS app is home to more than 850 brands, over 85,000 products, free delivery and return options. We empower fashion-loving 20-somethings all over the world to be whoever they want to be.

More ASOS app perks:

• Apple Pay for easy, speedy checkout
• Style Match – just take a picture, or upload one, and we’ll find similar products for you
• My Recommendations, AKA a tailor-made edit personalised for you
• A seamless experience between devices (synced Saved Items and shopping bag)
• Sale alerts and promotional nudges, so you’ll always stay up to date
• Handy catwalk videos and 360-degree views of products
• Delivery to 242 countries worldwide

Welcome, bargain hunters! Are you ready for the ultimate deal-hunting experience? Look no further than Booztlet, your Nordic Outlet.

Deals, deals, deals! More great deals than you have ever dreamt of in one place. Daily deals makes it easier to find your special bargain. Download the app and start scrolling - Booztlet, your Nordic Outlet. Our app is the perfect tool for finding outlet prices on cheap designer wear. And by outlet prices, we mean seriously discounted. We're talking "Holy cow, I can't believe I just got this for so little!" discounted.

We've got last season's styles that shine brighter than ever with awesome outlet prices. And we don't stop there - we throw in extra deals on top of those already amazing prices. You won't find better deals anywhere else.

Why use the app, you ask? Well, it's the easiest way to never miss out on a great deal again. We'll give you a quick overview of today's best deals each morning. And we've made it even easier for you to find what you're looking for - save your preferred sizes in your profile and use our brand search to find the best deals on items you actually want.

And the best part? Your cart, favourites, and browsing history are synced across devices, so you can continue your bargain hunting no matter where you are.

So what are you waiting for? Download the Booztlet app and start finding your dream cheap designer wear. Our outlet prices will make you feel like a true fashionista without breaking the bank. Booztlet - Easy, fast and secure shopping. Let's outlet!

Samkaup gera innkaupin ódýrari og skemmtilegri í Nettó, Iceland, Krambúðinni og Kjörbúðinni. Þú safnar inneign og getur borgað beint úr símanum. Samkaupa appið er einfalt í notkun og býður uppá fullt af spennandi möguleikum, eins og t.d. uppskriftir og auðvitað æðisleg tilboð (væntanlegt). Náðu þér í Samkaup í símann!

SAFNAÐU INNEIGN ÞEGAR ÞÚ VERSLAR
Í hvert sinn sem þú skannar inn Qr kóða við afgreiðsluborðið eða í sjálfsafgreiðslunni með appinu vinnurðu þér inn 2% inneign af innkaupunum. Inneignin er lögð inn á reikninginn þinn í símanum og hana má nota til að borga í verslunum Samkaupa. 

AUÐVELT AÐ BORGA
Það er hægt að borga beint með appinu bæði með inneign eða greiðslukorti. Þegar búið er að skanna vörurnar getur þú greitt með appinu, en mundu að skanna inn Qr kóðann fyrst sem er við kassann.  

ÞÚ GLEYMIR ALDREI HVAÐ ÞÚ KEYPTIR
Þér berast sjálfkrafa kvittanir svo það er engin leið að gleyma hvað maður keypti.

FRÉTTIR OG TILBOÐ
Í appinu birtast góð tilboð, uppskriftir og pistlar. Hugmyndir um hvað væri sniðugt í kvöldmatinn og allar þær vörur sem eru á tilboði þann daginn. Endalausir möguleikar til sparnaðar við hendina.  


Þjónustan er í stöðugri þróun og spennandi nýjungar væntanlegar.

developer: FULL SCALE FULL SPEED PTE. LTD.
description:

Are you always searching for the latest trends? Do you love discovering new outfits? 
Do you always go for looks that are a hit wherever you go? Then this is the place for you! 

Download the Bershka app now and discover a new way of buying clothes and fashion online, view fashion items on a daily basis, see the latest trends for him and for her, manage your account and find the nearest stores.


THE COMPLETE BERSHKA CATALOGUE IS WITHIN REACH 


With the Bershka app, you will get access to the online store and can buy clothes in the most comfortable way, get the latest news, the latest fashion trends and items, women’s clothing (dresses, coats, shirts, skirts, blouses, boots…) men’s clothing (trousers, shirts, jackets, t-shirts, shoes…) and accessories (bags, purses, jewellery, belts…) as well as beauty and make-up. 

CREATE A WISH LIST WITH ALL THE ITEMS YOU LOVE 

You can do more than just buy clothes. You can also look at the complete catalogue, select the items that you like the most, choose complete outfits, and make a list of the latest trends for your next shopping trip - choose what you love best! 

MANAGE YOUR ACCOUNT 

With the app, you can do more than just buy clothes. 
You can also manage your orders, keep track of your online purchases, contact the customer service team if you have any questions and recommend the app to your friends. 

DISCOVER THE STORES CLOSEST TO YOU 

Thanks to geolocation, the app can tell you where the nearest store is and whether the store sells womenswear, menswear or both, and also provides you with a contact number for the store in case you want to order a specific item. You can also save your favourite items to a list and access them immediately if necessary.


EVERYTHING YOU CAN DO WITH THE BERSHKA APP

√ Discover the latest fashion trends
With the app, you can quickly see which clothes will be in fashion each season.
√ Buy all the catalogue items 
Choose the clothes you love and buy them! You only have to choose your payment method, enter the delivery address and wait for your order to arrive as quickly as possible.
√ Create a wish list with the items you love the most 
You can find out which clothes and accessories are on-trend and you can also save the items you like the most to a wish list. You can add items for women and men in the app with a QR code or with a scanner. 
√ Manage your account 
Via your user account, you can review your purchases, track your orders and contact the customer service department with any questions you may have.
√Find new places to shop
The app shows you a list of the nearest stores. You can also see their location on the map and add them to your favourites list or view their details (contact phone number, if they sell womenswear, menswear or both, and the exact address)


Do you like to dress in the latest fashion? Do you like to buy clothes, shoes and accessories for women and men directly from your mobile? Do you want to see all the orders you have placed? Do you want to discover new stores? In that case, the Bershka app is exactly what you have been looking for. 

It’s much more than an online store.

Global luxury. One destination. Farfetch it.

Explore and shop the world's most iconic designer brands on FARFETCH.
The FARFETCH app makes it even easier to shop for designer styles from clothing to footwear, accessories, homeware and more. All from the world's leading luxury brands and boutiques.

EXPERIENCE VIRTUAL TRY-ON
Try on designer bags, rare watches, luxury sneakers and more with our Virtual Try-On experience, only available on the FARFETCH iOS app.

EXPLORE OUR GLOBAL NETWORK
• Find thousands of trending designer pieces, handpicked daily from your favorite brands and our network of global boutiques.
• Explore luxury clothing from an evolving edit of emerging designers and heritage brands.
• Shop the latest in designer sneakers, from boxfresh releases to rare drops, including sneakers authenticated by Stadium Goods.

FARFETCHED FOR YOU
• Shop a weekly curation of designer styles, shaped by the brands and pieces you love. 
• Enable tailored notifications and recommendations for a personalized shopping experience. 
• Be the first to know about new brands, the latest fashion launches, back-in-stock pieces, new-season styles and exclusive designer promotions.

NEW: 3D BAG VIEWER 
• You can now enjoy a 360° view of luxury bags on FARFETCH. Explore the size, dimensions and texture of the most iconic designer pieces in even finer detail, to shop your perfect style.

DESIGNER SHOPPING
• Discover luxury clothing, new fashion launches, coveted bags, new shoes, sneakers and fine jewelry, plus designer kidswear. 
• Get paperless returns across all designer brands, for a more seamless designer shopping experience.
• Shop pre-owned designer pieces, from Hermès Birkin bags to vintage Chanel and Louis Vuitton, and explore one-of-a-kind watches from heritage brands including Rolex, Cartier and Patek Philippe.

BECOME A FARFETCH MEMBER
• Elevate your designer shopping experience further when you become a FARFETCH member. 
• Shopping equals exclusive rewards and benefits when you shop through our FARFETCH membership program. 
• Every designer piece you shop takes you one step closer to unlocking more, from early sale access to priority customer care and your own personal stylist.

Any questions? Get in contact with us below. 

Seen it? Love it? Want it? Need it? Farfetch it.
